column5: Had a nice young couple out the other night taken there dad on a charter ..well lets just say they had a blast .with 3 fish over 25lbs and 27.6lbs the biggest .i guess you could say not bad for the 1st Kings of there life .. fished 5 hrs had over 40 hook ups ..all fish taken in 150 to 180 fow with riggers down 50 to 69 with SD Flies and Moonshine Spoons ..as for the dipsy had them back 125 to 180 on a 1 2 & a 2 1/2 setting with all SD Flie Combos ... sorry for the lack of reports but life has been crazy getting the boat ready for Erie Walleye and getting all set up for the Toronto Sun Derby ..more reports to come asap ..    Riggin The New Boat Here is a few pictures of back of the tug starting to get set up...    Fishmaster Ultimate Charter's http://www.mountaincable.net/~fishmaster
Seems as though there have been some big fish early this year..............
Nice catch!!!!!! man you are going to have an awesome charter boat,for sure,make sure you post lots of mpics of her when she is ready to go,great report....cheers

Great Report Steve,  Can't believe the size of the fish that are being caught... WOW  Lots of work getting done on that boat, can't wait to see your first reports coming off of the charters on her!  Have fun and Cheers,  Jen
FD ill post a full report this weekend when im launched and ready to fish the Eyes .....
Got the first girls number?  Gerritt.
Yesi have her # she booked the charter for her husband and dad ...   i do get some amazing clients ...
